titles.title: Former Vice President Protection Improvement Act of 2015
A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit threats against former Vice Presidents and members of their families, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
1/26/2015--Introduced. Former Vice President Protection Improvement Act of 2015
Amends the federal criminal code to prohibit knowingly and willfully threatening to kill, kidnap, or inflict bodily harm upon former Vice Presidents or members of their immediate families.
